languages.text: "Как свежо и неожиданно — богачи измываются над мирным населением, прикрываясь благими намерениями". {n}Обычно медовый голос Джай скрипит заржавевшей сталью.{/n}
"How refreshingly novel — the rich treating the common folk like dirt and coating it all with the best intentions." {n}Jae's usual honeyed voice now grates like rusted metal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как свежо и неожиданно — богачи измываются над мирным населением, прикрываясь благими намерениями". {n}Обычно медовый голос Джай скрипит заржавевшей сталью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "How refreshingly novel — the rich treating the common folk like dirt and coating it all with the best intentions." {n}Jae's usual honeyed voice now screeches like rusted metal.{/n}
"How refreshingly novel — the rich treating the common folk like dirt and coating it all with the best intentions." {n}Jae's usual honeyed voice now screeches like rusted metal.{/n}

"How refreshingly novel — the rich treating the common folk like dirt and coating it all with the best intentions." {n}Jae's usual honeyed voice now grates like rusted metal.{/n}

languages.text: 「なんとまあ、ぴっかぴかの新品じゃないか―金持ちが庶民を汚物のように扱い、それをすべて善意と言う偽善で塗り固める」 {n}ジェイのいつもの蜜のような甘い声が、錆びた金属のように耳につく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "How refreshingly novel — the rich treating the common folk like dirt and coating it all with the best intentions." {n}Jae's usual honeyed voice now grates like rusted metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なんとまあ、ぴっかぴかの新品じゃないか―金持ちが庶民を汚物のように扱い、それをすべて善意と言う偽善で塗り固める」 {n}ジェイのいつもの蜜のような甘い声が、錆びた金属のように耳につく。{/n}

languages.text: « Comme c'est innovant : les plus riches traitent les plus pauvres comme des chiens et essaient de faire croire qu'ils se soucient sincèrement de leur bien-être, » {n}déclare Jae d'un ton grinçant, bien différent de sa voix douce habituelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How refreshingly novel — the rich treating the common folk like dirt and coating it all with the best intentions." {n}Jae's usual honeyed voice now grates like rusted metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comme c'est innovant : les plus riches traitent les plus pauvres comme des chiens et essaient de faire croire qu'ils se soucient sincèrement de leur bien-être, » {n}déclare Jae d'un ton grinçant, bien différent de sa voix douce habituelle.{/n}

languages.text: “富人之所以将平民的生命视为粪土，仅仅是因为他们怀着美好的愿景罢了。哎哟，这个理由可真是让人耳目一新啊。”{n}婕伊原本蜜糖般的声音，此刻却像生锈的金属一样刺耳。{/n}
languages.original_text: "How refreshingly novel — the rich treating the common folk like dirt and coating it all with the best intentions." {n}Jae's usual honeyed voice now grates like rusted metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “富人之所以将平民的生命视为粪土，仅仅是因为他们怀着美好的愿景罢了。哎哟，这个理由可真是让人耳目一新啊。”{n}婕伊原本蜜糖般的声音，此刻却像生锈的金属一样刺耳。{/n}

languages.text: «Menuda novedad. Los ricos tratando a los pobres como si fueran basura y maquillándolo todo con buenas intenciones». {n}La habitual voz almibarada de Jae ahora chirría como el metal oxidado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How refreshingly novel — the rich treating the common folk like dirt and coating it all with the best intentions." {n}Jae's usual honeyed voice now grates like rusted metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Menuda novedad. Los ricos tratando a los pobres como si fueran basura y maquillándolo todo con buenas intenciones». {n}La habitual voz almibarada de Jae ahora chirría como el metal oxidado.{/n}

languages.text: "Welch erfrischende Abwechslung — die Reichen behandeln den Pöbel wie Dreck und reden es damit schön, dass sie doch beste Absichten hätten." {n}Jaes üblicherweise honigsüße Stimme kratzt nun wie rostiges Metall.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How refreshingly novel — the rich treating the common folk like dirt and coating it all with the best intentions." {n}Jae's usual honeyed voice now grates like rusted metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Welch erfrischende Abwechslung — die Reichen behandeln den Pöbel wie Dreck und reden es damit schön, dass sie doch beste Absichten hätten." {n}Jaes üblicherweise honigsüße Stimme kratzt nun wie rostiges Metall.{/n}

languages.text: "Ay ne kadar değişik, zenginler sıradan insanlara it gibi davranıyor ama üstünde iyi niyet cilasıyla yani." {n}Jae'ın her zamanki tatlı sesi, paslanmış metal gibi gıcırtılı çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How refreshingly novel — the rich treating the common folk like dirt and coating it all with the best intentions." {n}Jae's usual honeyed voice now grates like rusted metal.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ay ne kadar değişik, zenginler sıradan insanlara it gibi davranıyor ama iyi niyetle yani." {n}Jae'ın her zamanki tatlı sesi, paslanmış metal gibi gıcırtılı çıkıyor.{/n}
